column1: '''Faramir Took I''' was the thirty-third [[Thain]] of [[the Shire]], the twentieth of the [[Took Family
Faramir was the son of [[Peregrin Took
column2: Thain Peregrin Took I]] and [[Diamond of Long Cleeve]].<ref>{{App
column3: Took}}</ref> He was named after [[Faramir]], the [[Prince of Ithilien]] in [[Gondor]] far South, a good friend of his father. In {{SR
column4: 1463}} he married [[Goldilocks Gardner]], the third daughter of [[Samwise Gamgee]].  He succeeded his father when Peregrin relocated to [[Gondor]] in {{SR

column1: ''Faramir'' is a Sindarin name Meaning 'jewel hunter', Faramir I was named after [[Faramir]] who [[Pippin Took]], Faramir I's father saved.
